name: SurgeonVoice
0:
”Alexa tell surgeon voice to record procedure”
”Alexa tell surgeon voice to stop recording”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: surgeon voice
des:
This skill will be used to control a web app that will be used in medical transcriptions. The skill will allow hands free control of the app and just by using voice commands through Alexa. 

There is a companion application called surgeonvoice.com that users need to log into first. Upon login surgeon can record notes using voice commands through Alexa. Two key commands are record and stop. 

Record [section] will record the section being dictated. Section can be one of the four: procedure, findings, recommendation and impression.
Stop will stop the recording.

The key benefit in using this skill is that it enables hands-free operation of surgeon-voice. This can let the surgeon operate without the need to shift focus during surgery.
